attributes.action: disallow hair length and style discrimination in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Discrimination on any aspect of a person's appearance, be it an inherent or chosen aspect, should not be tolerated.
This includes length and style of hair.
Human beings have the right to look as they wish, providing their appearance does not affect the safety of another person.

With uniforms acting in schools, there is already a limit to the uniquity a student is able to have, and when hair length and style is discriminated against human rights to appearance are infringed and uniquity and a sense of self is removed.
